share.compareTitle: I am {type}! What's your MBTI compatibility?
share.bestDesc: {type1} and {type2} complement each other perfectly. You can maximize each other's strengths and fill in the gaps.
share.goodDesc: {type1} and {type2} work well together. With a little effort, you can build a deeper relationship.
share.badDesc: {type1} and {type2} may have personality differences, but understanding each other's uniqueness can be a growth opportunity.
share.neutralDesc: {type1} and {type2} have no particular strengths or weaknesses. However, with effort, it can develop into a good relationship.
